Title: Implements a healthy food initiative for beneficiaries of the supplemental nutrition assistance program
Summary: Requires the department of social services to apply for a waiver or request authorization to create a list of healthy and nutritious foods and beverages that may be purchased with supplemental nutrition assistance program (SNAP) benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, add ยง95-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to implementing a healthy food initiative for beneficiaries of the supplemental nutrition assistance program
